page.title: 17SUMMARY of Square 04390335
page.content:
This area is dominated by the junction and flyover of the A6005 and new A52.
There is a small un-manned railway station still in use and a mixture of fairly modern residential property and old village property.
The St.Werburgh's church has been there since 1347,replacing the Saxon church which was burned down.It is on the site of a Druid circle.
Courtaulds has been for years an important manufacturing company in the area,but over the last 5 years the workforce has been reduced to approx. 2,350 from 12,000.
